Package net.sf.appia.protocols.fifo

Protocol that provides reliable fifo order to unicast messages.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FifoConfig Interface FifoConfig
To use this, just change the value of the specific variable and recompile this interface and the code that uses the variable.
 

Class Summary
AckEvent Class AckEvent extends SendableEvent and is intended to send explicit (not piggybacked) acknowledgments of messages.
FIFOConfigEvent Class FIFOConfigEvent extends Event and is used for the configuration of FIFO sessions.
FifoLayer FifoLayer is the layer for the protocol providing reliable ordered delivery of messages.
FifoSession Class that implements reliable FIFO order for point to point and multicast messages.
FifoTimer FifoTimer is a periodic event to notify FifoSession
Header Class that implements the header of a message.
PeerInfo PeerInfo contains next expected sequence number, next sequence number to send and out of order messages for a single peer of a fifo session.
WaitingMessage this class keeps information about the Pending message and number of endPoints that didn't ack
It is also a Node of the global list of messages
 

Package net.sf.appia.protocols.fifo Description

Protocol that provides reliable fifo order to unicast messages. This protocol provides fifo order of messages in a reviable and efficient way, but just for unicast messages.
